# isExportable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you can export this asset using an export session.

## Declaration

```swift
var isExportable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you can export the asset using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetExportSession].
title: isExportable
